text: Helfenstein can refer to: * House of Helfenstein, a German noble family * Helfenstein Castle, a ruined castle near Geislingen an der Steige, Baden- Württemberg, Germany; the former seat of the House of Helfenstein * Helfenstein (Habichtswald), a hill in Hesse, Germany * Château de Helfenstein, a ruined castle near Éguelshardt, Lorraine, France * 8067 Helfenstein, a comet
title: Helfenstein
